long_description: The Outdoor Research Sentinel girls' hat protects youngsters from bug-borne misery and damaging sun exposure. Supplex(R) nylon is treated with Insect Shield(R) to repel mosquitoes, ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and no-see-ums. EPA-registered Insect Shield is an odorless treatment that lasts for approximately 70 washes. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Outdoor Research Sentinel hat features a soft, moisture-wicking headband for added comfort. Breakaway chin cord holds hat in place on windy days.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Sentinel girls' hat protects youngsters from bug-borne misery and damaging sun exposure.
